message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. The product is worth a lot to me, but I'm willing to compromise. Can you meet me halfway?

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,200,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to at least get $1,300,000 for this product. I'm confident you'll find this is still a good deal considering the value you'll get.
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your original offer, so I'll offer $1,350,000. Can you consider this?
